00024   void DeepAnaWriteEngine::registerParameters()
00025   {
00026     _hostProcessor.relayRegisterInputCollection(LCIO::RECONSTRUCTEDPARTICLE,
00027                                                 _engineName+"_InCol",
00028                                                 "Name of input collection",
00029                                                 _deepanaInColName, 
00030                                                 std::string("AhcClusters")  );
00031  
00032    _hostProcessor.relayRegisterInputCollection(LCIO::RECONSTRUCTEDPARTICLE,
00033                                                 _engineName+"_InNeutrCol",
00034                                                 "Name of input collection",
00035                                                 _deepanaInNeutrColName, 
00036                                                 std::string("AhcNeutrClusters")  );
00037 
00038   }
00039 
00040   void DeepAnaWriteEngine::registerBranches( TTree* hostTree )
00041   {
00042     //electromagnetic
00043     hostTree->Branch("elmNoClusters",  &_elmNoClusters , "elmNoClusters/I"  );
00044     hostTree->Branch("elmNoHits",      &_elmNoHits,      "elmNoHits/I"      );
00045     hostTree->Branch("elmEngySum",     &_elmEngySum,     "elmEngySum/D"     );
00046     //track
00047     hostTree->Branch("trkNoClusters",  &_trkNoClusters , "trkNoClusters/I"  );
00048     hostTree->Branch("trkNoHits",      &_trkNoHits,      "trkNoHits/I"      );
00049     hostTree->Branch("trkEngySum",     &_trkEngySum,     "trkEngySum/D"      );
00050     //hadronic
00051     hostTree->Branch("hadNoClusters",  &_hadNoClusters , "hadNoClusters/I"  );
00052     hostTree->Branch("hadNoHits",      &_hadNoHits,      "hadNoHits/I"      );
00053     hostTree->Branch("hadEngySum",     &_hadEngySum,     "hadEngySum/D"      );
00054     //neutral
00055     hostTree->Branch("neutrNoHits",      &_neutrNoHits,      "neutrNoHits/I"      );
00056     hostTree->Branch("neutrEngySum",     &_neutrEngySum,     "neutrEngySum/D"      );
00057    
00058     hostTree->Branch("elmX", &_elmX, "elmX/D");
00059     hostTree->Branch("elmY", &_elmY, "elmY/D");
00060     hostTree->Branch("elmZ", &_elmZ, "elmZ/D");
00061 
00062     hostTree->Branch("trkX", &_trkX, "trkX/D");
00063     hostTree->Branch("trkY", &_trkY, "trkY/D");
00064     hostTree->Branch("trkZ", &_trkZ, "trkZ/D");
00065 
00066     hostTree->Branch("hadX", &_hadX, "hadX/D");
00067     hostTree->Branch("hadY", &_hadY, "hadY/D");
00068     hostTree->Branch("hadZ", &_hadZ, "hadZ/D");
00069 
00070     hostTree->Branch("X", &_X, "X/D");
00071     hostTree->Branch("Y", &_Y, "Y/D");
00072     hostTree->Branch("Z", &_Z, "Z/D");
00073 
00074   }
00075 
00076 
00077   void DeepAnaWriteEngine::fillVariables( EVENT::LCEvent* evt ) 
00078   {
00079     DeepAnalysis deepAnalysis; 
00080     LCCollection* clusterCollection;
00081 
00082     try{
00083         //accept only beam events
00084         const TriggerBits trigBits(evt->getParameters().getIntVal(PAR_TRIGGER_EVENT));
00085         if (trigBits.isBeamTrigger()){
00086 
00087           clusterCollection = evt->getCollection( _deepanaInColName );
00088 
00089           _elmNoClusters = 0;
00090           _elmEngySum    = 0;
00091           _trkNoClusters = 0;
00092           _trkEngySum    = 0;
00093           _hadNoClusters = 0;
00094           _hadEngySum    = 0;
00095           _neutrEngySum  = 0;
00096           _neutrNoHits   = 0;
00097 
00098           _elmX = 0;
00099           _elmY = 0;
00100           _elmZ = 0;
00101 
00102           _trkX = 0;
00103           _trkY = 0;
00104           _trkZ = 0;
00105           
00106           _hadX = 0;
00107           _hadY = 0;
00108           _hadZ = 0;
00109 
00110           _X = 0;
00111           _Y = 0;
00112           _Z = 0;
00113 
00114           _elmNoHits  = 0;
00115           _trkNoHits  = 0;
00116           _hadNoHits  = 0;
00117           _neutrNoHits  = 0;
00118 
00119           //loop over all elements in the input collection
00120           for(int elem_i = 0; elem_i < clusterCollection->getNumberOfElements(); elem_i++){
00121             EVENT::Cluster *a_cluster = dynamic_cast<EVENT::Cluster *>(clusterCollection->getElementAt(elem_i));
00122             int clusterType = a_cluster->getType();
00123 
00124             //see calice_reco/clustering/include/DeepAnalysisProcessor.hh
00125             //ClusterTypes elm   = CLUSTER_EM;  //10
00126             //ClusterTypes trk   = CLUSTER_TRK; //11
00127             //ClusterTypes had   = CLUSTER_HAD; //12
00128             //ClusterTypes neutr = CLUSTER_NEUTR; //13
00129 
00130             if ( (clusterType >> CLUSTER_EM) ==1 ){
00131               _elmEngySum += a_cluster->getEnergy();
00132               _elmNoClusters++;
00133             }
00134             else if ( (clusterType >> CLUSTER_TRK) ==1 ){
00135               _trkEngySum += a_cluster->getEnergy();
00136               _trkNoClusters++;
00137             }
00138             else if ( (clusterType >> CLUSTER_HAD) ==1 ){
00139               _hadEngySum += a_cluster->getEnergy();
00140               _hadNoClusters++;
00141             }
00142 
00143 
00144             unsigned int size = (a_cluster->getCalorimeterHits()).size();
00145             
00146             if (      (clusterType >> CLUSTER_TRK) ==1 ) {
00147               _trkNoHits = _trkNoHits + size;
00148             }
00149             else if ( (clusterType >> CLUSTER_EM)  ==1 ){
00150               _elmNoHits = _elmNoHits + size;
00151             }
00152             else if ( (clusterType >> CLUSTER_HAD) ==1 ) {
00153               _hadNoHits = _hadNoHits +  size;
00154             }
00155 
00156             const EVENT::CalorimeterHitVec &hit_col = a_cluster->getCalorimeterHits();
00157             for (EVENT::CalorimeterHitVec::const_iterator hit_iter = hit_col.begin();
00158                  hit_iter!=hit_col.end();
00159                  hit_iter++) {
00160               
00161               double x = (*hit_iter)->getPosition()[0];
00162               double y = (*hit_iter)->getPosition()[1];
00163               double z = (*hit_iter)->getPosition()[2];
00164               
00165               if (      (clusterType >> CLUSTER_TRK) ==1 ) {
00166                 _trkX = x;
00167                 _trkY = y;
00168                 _trkZ = z;
00169               }
00170               else if ( (clusterType >> CLUSTER_EM)  ==1 ) {
00171                 _elmX = x;
00172                 _elmY = y;
00173                 _elmZ = z;
00174               }
00175               else if ( (clusterType >> CLUSTER_HAD) ==1 ){
00176                 _hadX = x;
00177                 _hadY = y;
00178                 _hadZ = z;
00179               }
00180 
00181               _X = x;
00182               _Y = y;
00183               _Z = z;
00184               
00185             }//end loop over CalorimeterHits
00186           }//end loop over elements in input collection
00187 
00188           //=====================================================================
00189           //=====================================================================
00190           //=====================================================================
00191           LCCollection *neutrCol = evt->getCollection(_deepanaInNeutrColName);
00192           for (int j = 0; j < neutrCol->getNumberOfElements(); j++){
00193             CalorimeterHit *a_hit = dynamic_cast<CalorimeterHit *>(neutrCol->getElementAt(j));
00194             _neutrEngySum += a_hit->getEnergy();
00195             _neutrNoHits++;
00196           }
00197           //=====================================================================
00198           //=====================================================================
00199           //=====================================================================
00200 
00201         }//end of if(isTriggerBeam)
00202       }//end of try
00203 
00204     catch ( DataNotAvailableException err ) {
00205       cout <<  "WARNING: Collection "<< _deepanaInColName
00206            << " not available in event "<< evt->getEventNumber() << endl;
00207       
00208       _elmNoClusters = INVALIDI;
00209       _elmNoHits     = INVALIDI;
00210       _elmEngySum    = INVALIDD;
00211       _trkNoClusters = INVALIDI;
00212       _trkNoHits     = INVALIDI;
00213       _trkEngySum    = INVALIDD;
00214       _hadNoClusters = INVALIDI;
00215       _hadNoHits     = INVALIDI;
00216       _hadEngySum    = INVALIDD;
00217       _neutrNoHits   = INVALIDI;
00218       _neutrEngySum  = INVALIDD;
00219       
00220       _elmX = INVALIDD;
00221       _elmY = INVALIDD;
00222       _elmZ = INVALIDD;
00223       _trkX = INVALIDD;
00224       _trkY = INVALIDD;
00225       _trkZ = INVALIDD;
00226       _hadX = INVALIDD;
00227       _hadY = INVALIDD;
00228       _hadZ = INVALIDD;
00229       _X = INVALIDD;
00230       _Y = INVALIDD;
00231       _Z = INVALIDD;
00232     }
00233     
00234     
00235   }
00236 
00237 }//namespace marlin

00240 #endif //RTW_USE_CLUSTERING
